mapper.update: update instrument_event_code set instrument_id = #{instrumentId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, msg = #{msg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, level = #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, instrument_id, code, msg, level, create_by, update_by, create_time, update_time from instrument_event_code
